extends Remote

login(MessageReceiver)
log in to system
send(Message)

login 
 public abstract int login(MessageReceiver client) throws RemoteException
log in to system

Returns:
id the id assigned to this client. Note that the client's setId() method is called directly by login().
send 
 public abstract void send(Message message) throws RemoteException
